description: Numbers n such that A005728(n) is prime.
comments: From a question by Leo Moser.
references: Martin Gardner, "The Last Recreations," Chapter entitled "Strong Laws of Small Primes," Copernicus, Springer-Verlag, NY 1997, page 199.
mathematica: s=1; Do[s = s + EulerPhi[n]; If[PrimeQ[s], Print[n]], {n, 200}]
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 04 2000
